opinion.case_name: Suarez Medina v. Cockrell, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division

opinion:
536 U.S. 972

SUAREZ MEDINA
v.
COCKRELL, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION.

No. 01-9960.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 28, 2002.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of petitioner to amend petition for writ of certiorari granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 31 Fed. Appx. 835.
